name: First Person Pac Man Horror Game
name_original: First Person Pac Man Horror Game
description:
Description:

Play as PacMan but in first person, added creepy ambience and jump sacres to raise stakes. Try and get all points before losing 3 lives to win.

Used as a starter project to practice UnrealEngine4/AI programming.

Controls: 

WASD - Walk
Mouse - Look

Alt+F4 - Close

WARNING: Sound is a little loud (jump scare).

DevLog to come!
